title: [Inhouse] O3 Data structure updates & enhancements
description:
Description
  As a PO of the O3 Team
I would like to support several enhancements on the Inhouse E2E Chain to have more orders transmitted, enriched and best case completed in/from EOS
So that EOS users can deliver faster & at higher quality to our end customers.
Features i.e.:
Support transmission of contract type information between SeCeIT and EOS as long as oPIM does not support this feature. This requires extension of O3 order structure. As soon as oPIM supports this feature (Data transfer SECE-IT ALMV <-> oPIM) the process is to be amended (PI29?)
MAGBUS-84671 - Inhouse Basic: Vertragsarten nach EOS übergeben
supported by ADCL-12006
Order Structure amendment & E2E Testing Support for
MAGBUS-100840 - Inhouse Basic: Erweiterung der Änderungsaufträge um den Umzug und SLA Nachvermarktung
see SECEIT Umzug , SLA Nachvermarktung
supported by ADCL-12473
Critical Ad hoc requirements on Inhouse Chain (on exception basis)
